text: Up and Downs is a 1983 Canadian drama movie directed by Paul Almond and starring Andrew Sabiston, Leslie Hope, Eric Angus, Margo Nesbitt, Gavin Brennan, Colin Skinner, Bobby Pollard. ==Other websites== * Category:1983 drama movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Almond Category:Movies set in British Columbia Category:Movies set in boarding schools
title: Ups and Downs (1983 movie)
